alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Jefferson; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 3:57AM EST until March 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Northwest winds will gust around 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north-central and western Maryland, eastern West Virginia, and the northern Shenandoah Valley of Virginia. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM EST Saturday. Rain will change to snow between 3 and 5 AM early Saturday. The steadiest snow will be through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may be reduced to below one- half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
